meanings.definition: A path for pedestrians at the side of a street.
meanings.sent1: I enjoy walking on the sidewalks to get to the park.
meanings.sent2: Be careful when crossing the street, always use the sidewalks.
meanings.sent3: The squirrels on the sidewalks seem to have their own little highway.
meanings.sent4: Her mind wandered like a lost soul on the sidewalks of a bustling city.
meanings.sent5: The colorful flowers peeking out from the sidewalks brightened up the whole street.

meanings.definition: Paved walkway along the side of a road.
meanings.sent1: The city council decided to renovate the sidewalks for better accessibility.
meanings.sent2: People were strolling leisurely on the sidewalks, enjoying the sunny day.
meanings.sent3: The ducks waddled along the sidewalks as if they owned the place.
meanings.sent4: His thoughts raced faster than the cars on the sidewalks during rush hour.
meanings.sent5: The moonlight cast a mysterious glow on the empty sidewalks late at night.
